articles.title: Don Shula, coach who led Dolphins to NFL's only perfect season, dies aged 90 - The Guardian
articles.description: Don Shula, the head coach with the most wins in NFL history, has died at the age of 90
articles.content:
Don Shula, the head coach with the most wins in NFL history, has died at the age of 90.
